entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -30.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Inukjuak Airport 11:49 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -30.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -34.1°C
Wind: S 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 37 with temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 38 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
